website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive option for setting up satellite radio at home is a must for those seeking the best deal possible.
pros: Easy to set up satellite radio at home, with the Roady XT receiver
Simple to assemble, and comes with an antenna, docking station, remote control, AC power adapter, and RCA cable
cons: Can only be used with the Roady XT receiver
May need to place antenna near window to get better reception

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these kits and they both work great. You have to make sure the antenna is right on a window sill (at least in the two places I have lived they had to be right by the window) but that isn't a problem since the cords are long enough that you can have the docking station near your other media devices but still have the antenna where it needs to be to pick up a signal. We've used these kits for several years and haven't had any problems with it stopping working or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Myers

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I am a newbie in the satellite radio world, but quickly became an XM addict after having the car kit for only a matter of hours. The home kit might even be better because there is none of that dreaded occasional static that comes unexpectedly when driving by any large objects on the receiving side of the satellite (insert proper term here if there is one). My only complaint lies with the remote - I didn't find it to be very user friendly, besides the radio screen is too small to see from more than a couple of feet away. I enthusiastically recommend this product to anyone considering the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest Kit I Could Find
customer_reviews.text: The XPressRC doesn't fit into the holster, but a few minutes with a hack saw fixed that. (If you're going to do that too; first remove the screws on the bottom and take the thing apart so you don't damage the PCB. I almost made that mistake.) I'm very happy. This was the cheapest kit I could find. The remote even works for the XPress unit. The cord for the antenna is extremely long so I could place it in a location out of sight that gets good reception. I bought another kit to stick in the bathroom too :)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Roady XT Home Kit--Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been XM subscribers for over two years. We love it. We used a Roady II Home Kit until August '07 when we finally had to replace it. We'd had such good luck with the Delphi Roady II that we decided to upgrade it to a Roady XT. It works great. I had it installed in less than one minute and after a quick equipment switch with XM, we were up and running again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dock
customer_reviews.text: I've always hated the big boombox-like Delphi amplifier/speaker. It sounded OK but was just plain ugly and cheap looking. This kit allows me to connect my Roady XT to my Tivoli radio and get a better sound from a lot nicer looking package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to expand the use of my Roady reciever since it is in my RV so I hooked the home kit up to my stereo in my garage to listen to XM Radio. Since I have a plan for that reciever I can here the radio more often. I got the home kit through Amazon and have been pleased with it since.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie

customer_reviews.title: Roady Home Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this home kit for my Raody XT. This thing works great! The antenna it comes with have a very, very long cord so you can place your receiver almost anywhere and still have a clear shot to a window for reception. The remote control is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Paulin

customer_reviews.title: You can’t  miss any of your SiriusXM radio preferences with this setup
customer_reviews.text: Home radio setup is great and very easy to attach to your Roady XT
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the home, then got Sirus on TV so moved to my older car. Bought a new car so moved it to our new Can-Am motorcycle. This product has lasted a long time and works as well now as it did when it was first bought.
customer_reviews.author: Janice C. King

customer_reviews.title: Now after shutting it off it will not start up - not a good sign for a recommendation
customer_reviews.text: When we received it we had a hard time turning it on. When we pushed the on button the screen flickered , then after multiple attempts it came on,and it was left on for weeks. Now after shutting it off it will not start up - not a good sign for a recommendation. Is there a chance for a replacement ?
customer_reviews.author: CLAIRE PESOLA

customer_reviews.title: roady home kit
customer_reviews.text: works very well , now I can get the full use of my subricption, had in vehicle that was not used often , now use it (home kit) every day .. price well spent
customer_reviews.author: corkie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this home kit when I wasn't able to find it at any major electronics store. I found out, the hard way, that my Roady XT was out of date and that no stores carried the correct home kit that I was looking for. I found it here, and it works perfectly! I am happy with my purchase, and was glad to be able to still find what I needed here.
customer_reviews.author: Irene O. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: added addtion
customer_reviews.text: wanted xm in the garage easy hook up good to go. already had car kit and and account now i can enjoy xm in the house
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This kit bought new life to my office at work.
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: Home kit solved a dilemma
customer_reviews.text: We have two satellite radio receivers for our cars and wanted to have a home kit so we can listen to jazz while falling asleep at night. We started looking for hd radio receivers and ended up with this and it was very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Fortier

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my Father so he could use his XM radio in his house. Once we got it set up, he had many hours of entertainment with this hooked up to the house system.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Delphi Roady XT Home Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great "little" package! Added to my home stereo system for sound, XM is a wonderful addition to a home stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Bikerchick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed. Set up was easier than expected and I haven'thad any problems. I love listening to my satellite radio at home! The product was shipped very quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia L. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Roady Home setup
customer_reviews.text: The antenna works great even with an extension cable. Set it up in the attic close to a wood grill and it works perfectly even with 50' of extension cable.
customer_reviews.author: Diver Mike

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: It is great to be able to play my Sirius XM radio through my home theater system. Great for parties and every day. I have it on all day, every day. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: BD in KC

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this kit. Hooked it up and was able to get XM through my bose
customer_reviews.author: RFW

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect accessory to the xm car kit. I love being able to take the music with me anywhere. Business travel, vacation doesn't matter. Very easy set up, the antenna has a long enough cord for you to move around to get the best reception. The remote is a good item also for the lazy days when relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Muzic luver

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved
customer_reviews.text: My XM radio quit. It was puzzling but by eliminating possible problems, I found what I needed to replace. I asked Google for help and was directed to Amazon. Next time I need help, I will go directly to such a fantastic source. My radio is restored..............I love satellite broadcasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jollymo

customer_reviews.title: Great Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: This product allows use of your XM radio at home or work. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Okay but expensive...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 star rating has nothing to do with the quality of the item, just with the price. You get the home docking station, an AC adapter, the home antenna, a cable and a remote. It just seemed a little weird to have to spend about the same as the radio itself to get items that you really need to enjoy your Roady XT at home. I think Delphi should sell a unit that has *everything* you need to enjoy Satellite Radio in your car and your home for a really fair price.
customer_reviews.author: RDSWY4

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Git it...it el work! Make sure you have a powered speaker to hook into, with line-in or audio L-R plugs.
customer_reviews.author: MtnBrady

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition To The Roady
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you want to use your XM indoors, the remote is a nice addition which can be used in the car as well (be sure to keep your eyes on the road). Everything you need comes in the kit. Enjoy:-)
customer_reviews.author: ALRUI

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We received the item timely and quickly (Christmas Gift). Worked great when first installed and haveing some teething problems ... but PROBABLY operator error and not merchadise error. We recommend seller for fast and quick shipping and response.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and instructions
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what I needed for my XM Radio. Easy setup and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Malley

customer_reviews.title: Satellite radio components.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I am using the components I needed. The rest are put away for future use
customer_reviews.author: M. Glenn Horst

customer_reviews.title: Works with Skyfi 3
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought this because it was significatly cheaper than the Skyfi 3 home kit. Even the remote works with the Skyfi 3. Also I get reception in my garage which is a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Home Kit
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to install, worked well when installed and is easy to use. Converting from vehicle to home use couldn't be more simple.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Haberlen

customer_reviews.title: Roady XT Home Kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. Really simplifies hookup to stereo. Bought an extra one for out by the pool! Just plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kolbert

customer_reviews.title: Remote control only...haven't set up the rest of it
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a trip and used the remote control in the car...very handy. I'll set up the home kit now that we're back from vacation.
customer_reviews.author: HelenRScP

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Great company and I am glad they still had this product. Mine original home kit was taken out by lightning. Looked and looked for a replacement since the radio worked great. They had it at a good price. Shipped quickly. Also got me back up and running,
customer_reviews.author: TNMike

customer_reviews.title: The base will not power my Delphi unit. My ...
customer_reviews.text: The base will not power my Delphi unit. My radio works in both car bases and the base in my boat. The company did send me another base that they assured me was bench tested. The exact same result.
customer_reviews.author: tkring

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This Home Kit does as advertised and it does connect your Delphi radio to your home stereo or any speaker combination. Everything works well and the connection is easy. If you are changing from a Sirius setup to an XM setup then you do not even have to change antennas. Just plug in the old one. The only improvement that I would make would to have included the ability to broadcast the radio signal wirelessly around the house, over an FM frequency, just like the auto unit and the Sirius home dock do.
customer_reviews.author: George Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Extra home unit/minus radio
customer_reviews.text: I now have an extra dock, power supply, antenna, remote and cables to hook to stereo, easy to move radio from room to room now.
customer_reviews.author: The Craw

customer_reviews.title: Nice Find
customer_reviews.text: I received my shipment sooner than expected. This was an order to replace old equipment, and I got exactly what I needed. I was up and running in 5 minutes. I am so pleased and highly recommend this kit for Roady XT owners
customer_reviews.author: Laura Byers

customer_reviews.title: Love the Home Kit!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect for what I needed. Had the radio in the truck but on leaving the vehicle I wanted to keep listening. The home kit was perfect. Only one drawback make sure you have a clear unobstructed view of the South sky in North America. Highly recommended, loved the remote for touch free operation. Antenna cord was just long enough to reach from my desk to a south facing window in my boss' office. About 30 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for about a month and everything works well. It was a replacement for an older kit. Able to use the remote from the old kit with this also.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Lathan

customer_reviews.title: A must for the Roady XT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Antenna. The power supply is something the receiver should have come with from the beginning. I'm not exactly sure what to do with the remote... maybe people who bother to remember what all the channels are and how to use the silly thing will have better results- I'm probably just too impatient.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great except for the remote....
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, but the remote worked with the XT but was for a different model. I think it was substituted or an older version. Still happy with the overall purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: KCxx2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and had everything needed to make a home kit.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Longlitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my new car, it had builtin XM Radio, making transfer of my Roady XT from my old car unnecessary. The Home kit was just what I needed for using my Roady with my bedroom stereo. It works just as advertised. Now, I'm the proud owner of 4 XM radios!
customer_reviews.author: Cholly

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: This product is quality, even the remote is slightly heavy to the touch and well designed. Easy setup and makes the Roady a true portable unit from home to vehicle and back again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N. GilmoreTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Delphi Roady XT Home Kit ( SA10176 )
customer_reviews.text: This kit is fantastic. Easy to install and it works great!!! I hooked it to my reciver and have great reception and sound quality. This allows me to use my XM Roady in my house as well as my car. Moving the radio from one to the other takes 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy that I found this product on amazon. The price was right and the fact that I could pay for it by using my bank information made it just GREAT for me.......
customer_reviews.author: E. Walthour

customer_reviews.title: roady xt home doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Never was able to get it to work either in my home or in the camper. assume it's defective but at the price not worth the trouble to fool with shipping it back.
customer_reviews.author: William Guy

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this purchase. Just what I expected. I have enjoyed XM in my car for many years. Now I can enjoy it at home also.
customer_reviews.author: WEEZL-NAHZ

customer_reviews.title: did what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: it worked like a charm , easy deal ////iam happy with the product , got what i asked for, fast shipping,no problems thanks
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Delphi Roady XT Home Kit (SA10176)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Mother. It was a great help to her, she loves it. Also at a great price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Roady and the home kit makes it complete. Easy to install and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oelke

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for, but it hand been discontinued at my local radio supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Ruppel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Works real good, no problems with reception or setup. use it every day. got a second one to use at work.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Cordell

customer_reviews.title: No FM Frequency Option
customer_reviews.text: Pitiful that you can't transmit XM to FM on the home-kit. On the Roady 2 home-kit you could. Why did they take this important feature out? Good luck playing it on a portable stereo or boombox which doesn't take RCA connections!
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Remote is useful for use on the road. Audio cables may be too short for some applications, but the antenna wire is quite long.
customer_reviews.author: Ol' Sparky

customer_reviews.title: IT WAS EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED & THE PRICE WAS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: IT GOT HERE VERY QUICKLY WHAT I ORDERED AND A VERY GOOD PRICE. THE SELLER ALSO LET ME KNOW HE GOT MY ORDER AND WHEN IT WAS TO BE SHIPPED. WOULD BUY FROM THEM AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Ordaz

customer_reviews.title: Delphi Roady XT Home Kit ( SA10176 )
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great,I can hear non stop music in my house and car. Instruction were clear and it worked the first time. Larry
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your not an audio vox XM
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this product is great but it did not say will not work with XM (Audio Vox)head units.
customer_reviews.author: Stump Jumper

customer_reviews.title: You've got to be kidding!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my Delphi Roady satellite XM radio it came with all this plus the set up things needed for the car for about $50. The radio conked out after less than a year and I stupidly tossed all the other stuff thinking I wouldn't use it again. Now they sell everything separately and charge more for it??? I think I'll stick with free radio.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

product_meta.title: Delphi SA10176 Roady XT Home Kit
product_meta.description:
*:Standard PackagingDelphi SA10176-11P1 Roady XT Home Kit

AMAZON.COM
The Delphi Roady XT Home Kit allows you to play the Delphi Roady XT Receiver through your home audio system. It includes a home docking station, remote control, AC power adapter, indoor/outdoor antenna, and an audio patch cable. The high-gain antenna gives you interior or exterior mounting options, and features a hinged base for flexible positioning. The antenna can be placed on any horizontal surface or mounted vertically to a wall. Delphi and XM radio recommend that the antenna be positioned near a south-facing window or outdoors with a clear view of the southeastern sky to receive the satellite signal.

 The included remote control is compact and contains a numeric keypad and a variety of buttons that make it easy to navigate XM radio from the comfort of your couch. The docking station is simple with a proprietary XT Roady interface, power input, antenna signal input, and audio output. Power is supplied via a round, five-volt DC connector for connecting the AC adapter; a single SMB connector is used to connect the XM antenna; and the 3.5-millimeter mini-jack supplies a stereo audio output.

 Note: An XM satellite radio subscription (sold separately) is required to listen to XM satellite programming.

 What's in the Box
Antenna, docking station, remote control, AC power adapter, and RCA cable.
feature_bullets: For use with the Roady XT receiver.
